name: Bouncy Penguin Free
description:
I can’t fly, but I sure can Bounce!!

LITTLE penguin has a BIG dream! Bored of his frozen tundra of a home, Penguin is trying to cross the ocean and see the world beyond ice. Although he’s very new in the 'flight' department, with your help, he can produce a powerful bounce if given the right tap at the right time. How far can you help our Penguin travel? Let's go!

Game Video: http://youtu.be/vK0HQ94EGXM

★★★★★

Simple one touch control.

Customize your character with loads of unique upgrade items and hats in the shop.

5 unique worlds to discover and more to come in the future update also!

Plenty of bonuses and useful items to assist Penguin to fly longer and get more stars

Suprising guests and different other animal characters are in the game to help or stop the Penguin as well.

Compete with friends all over the world on both leaderboards and achievements

★★★★★

If you get any problem of the game,feel free to contact us:
email: info[at]sphinxjoy[dot]com
Thank you for understanding.And enjoy the game!

★★★★★
